message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $12000. Considering its high quality and unique features, I would like to propose a price of $11000 for it. I believe this offer presents a great opportunity for both of us.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While I recognize the product's value, my budget for this purchase is closer to $10000.  I'd be willing to buy the product for that price.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your honesty. To find a middle ground, I would like to propose a price of $10500 for the product. This offer reflects a compromise between our respective positions and I hope it will be acceptable to you.
